member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingCallback
member.summary: Callback interface to be implemented by clients of the STextTemplating service that wish to process errors and information

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingCallback.ErrorCallback(System.Boolean,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Process an error or warning
member.param: Whether this message is a warning or an error
The text of the message
The line in the file the error occurred at
The column in the file the error occurred at

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingCallback.SetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Inform the client the extension specified by the template
member.param: The file extension specified

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingCallback.SetOutputEncoding(System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Informs the client of the output file encoding requested by the template or directive processors.
member.param: Encoding
Whether the request was from an output directive in the template

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplating
member.summary: The principal worker interface for the STextTemplating service

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplating.ProcessTemplate(System.String,System.String,Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Process the contents of a templated file running inline code to produce completed output
member.param: The filename of the template to process. Can be the empty string.
The actual content of the template to process
The (optional) interface to call back on with error information
The (optional) hierarchy of the template. This should be of type IVsHierarchy

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplating.PreprocessTemplate(System.String,System.String,Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingCallback,System.String,System.String,System.String[]@)
member.summary: Process the contents of a templated file running inline code to produce a class that represents the template
member.param: The filename of the template to process. Can be the empty string.
The actual content of the template to process
The (optional) interface to call back on with error information
The name of the class to generate
The namespace within which to generate the class
The set of references demanded by the template

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplating.BeginErrorSession
member.summary: Setup/Reset the system that causes only unique errors to be logged. Also creates an implicit code generation session.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplating.EndErrorSession
member.summary: Finish a session using the system that causes only unique errors to be logged.
member.returns: True if errors were encountered during the session, false otherwise

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingComponents
member.summary: Interface on the STextTemplating service to support advanced scenarios requiring manipulation of the components of the text templating service

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingComponents.Host
member.summary: Get the singleton Vs Host
member.remarks: This host can be passed to a text transformation engine instance to transform templates in exactly the same way the main ITextTemplating service interface operates. Typically calls the InputFile property and Hierarchy are set for each template to be transformed before any calls to ProcessTemplate on the Engine.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingComponents.Engine
member.summary: Get the singleton text templating engine

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingComponents.InputFile
member.summary: The input filename that the host uses to report errors
member.remarks: Null is an acceptable value if the transformation is not file-based

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingComponents.Callback
member.summary: The error reporting and file extension callback that the host uses.
member.remarks: Null is an acceptable value if no callback is required

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingComponents.Hierarchy
member.summary: The hierarchy to use to help resolve project references.
member.remarks: This value should be of type IVsHierarchy. It is reperesented as object to avoid dependency issues. Null is an acceptable value if no hierarchy is required

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngine
member.summary: The main processing interface for text templating files

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngine.ProcessTemplate(System.String,Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost)
member.summary: Process the contents of a templated file running inline code to produce completed output
member.param: The content of the templated file
The hosting environment using this engine
member.returns: The processed contents of the file

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngine.PreprocessTemplate(System.String,Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost,System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.String[]@)
member.summary: Process the contents of a templated file running inline code to produce a class that represents the template.
member.param: The content of the templated file
The hosting environment using this engine
The name of the class to produce
The namespace of the class to produce
The language that the template's control code was written in
The set of references required by the template
member.returns: The preprocessed contents of the file

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost
member.summary: Interface to implement for applications wanting to host the T4 engine
member.remarks: An interface as it seems quite possible the host may be derived from something else

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost.LoadIncludeText(System.String,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Acquire the text corresponding to a request to include a partial template file
member.param: The file to include
The content of the included file
The location of the included file
member.remarks: Location can be null or empty for non filesystem based hosts

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost.ResolveAssemblyReference(System.String)
member.summary: Allow host to provide more context for an assembly reference
member.remarks: Host could choose to prepend a path for instance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost.ResolveDirectiveProcessor(System.String)
member.summary: Return the type of a directive processor, given its friendly name

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost.ResolvePath(System.String)
member.summary: Resolve a relative to its absolute path
member.remarks: DirectiveProcessors can use this to locate files to load etc. Used for any file types that do not have a specific resolve method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost.ResolveParameterValue(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Resolve the value of a parameter for a directive processor
member.remarks: The value returned can depend on the ID of the directive being processed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost.ProvideTemplatingAppDomain(System.String)
member.summary: Provide an AppDomain to run the generated transformation class

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost.LogErrors(System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection)
member.summary: Log a collection of errors or warnings from the templating process

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost.SetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Tell the host about the file extension that the template expects for the generated text
member.remarks: The method should not be renamed to a property in FxCop â€“ exception should be made.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost.SetOutputEncoding(System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tell the host what encoding the output file should be written out in.
member.param: The encoding to use
true of the encoding was set by an output directive

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost.GetHostOption(System.String)
member.summary: Get the value of a control option from the host.
member.param: The name of the option
member.returns: The value of the option or null to specify that the host doesn't care

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost.StandardAssemblyReferences
member.summary: Allow host to specify standard assemblies referenced by generated transformation class

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost.StandardImports
member.summary: Allow host to specify standard namespaces imported by generated transformation class

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost.TemplateFile
member.summary: Ask the host what the filename of the template is
member.remarks: It's fine to throw not implemented from this property if the implementing host is not file-based.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingSessionHost
member.summary: Interface that allows an object to create and hold on to an ITextTransformationSession object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingSessionHost.CreateSession
member.summary: Make an instance of a user session

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingSessionHost.Session
member.summary: The session this host is presently using.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingSession
member.summary: Interface denoting an object that marks out a set of runs of the Text Templating engine.
member.remarks: Sessions are objects serialized across application domains and processes. They have dictionary behavior to allow parameters to be passed into the T4 engine and are compared by comparing their Guid-based Id property to allow different implementation types to be directly compared.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingSession.Id
member.summary: Identity of this session - used to compare session instances by value

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.STextTemplating
member.summary: The service interface for the STextTemplating service
member.remarks: Empty, the real work is done by interfaces you cast this to.
